Conduit configuration

PropertyDecriptionRequired/Optional
com.inmobi.conduit.clustersProvide the name of cluster to process  
#cluster definitions are included in conduit.xml		Required
com.inmobi.conduit.zkconnect#address:port of zk serviceoptional
com.inmobi.conduit.cfgPath to consuit.xml fileRequired
com.inmobi.conduit.log4jto specify log fileOptional
com.inmobi.conduit.krb.principal
com.inmobi.conduit.keytab
com.inmobi.conduit.enablezkto use zoo keeper
com.inmobi.conduit.current.cluster
com.inmobi.conduit.MBPerMapperMax number of bytes per mapperOptional
com.inmobi.conduit.streamsPerLocalNumber of streams per each LocalSTreamService threadOptional
com.inmobi.conduit.streamsPerMergeNumber of streams per each MergedStreamService threadOptional
com.inmobi.conduit.streamsPerMirrorNumber of streams per each MirrorStreamService threadOptional
com.inmobi.conduit.distcp.dirsPerStreamNumber of dirs per each runOptional
com.inmobi.conduit.purgerEnabledenable/disable purger serviceOptional
com.inmobi.conduit.retriesnumber of times it retry before failing the fs operationOptional
com.inmobi.conduit.filesPerCollectorPerLocalStreamIt can only process max number of files per collector in each runOptional
com.inmobi.conduit.timeoutToProcessLastCollectorFileHow much time (in minutes) it has to wait before processing the last file (only for LocalStream Service)Optional
com.inmobi.conduit.metrics.enabledenable conduit-worket metricsOptional
com.inmobi.conduit.metrics.ganglia
com.inmobi.conduit.metrics.console
com.inmobi.conduit.metrics.ganglia.serverNamehostname
com.inmobi.conduit.metrics.ganglia.portport
com.inmobi.conduit.metrics.period
